螊字的基本解释

螊
lián
生长在海里的一种像蛤蜊的动物，肉可以吃：“或至海边，拘螊、??以资养。”

螊字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《集韻》離鹽切，平鹽，來。］
动物名。蛤属。

螊字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　螊； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1092第37
【唐韻】力鹽切【集韻】離鹽切，?音廉。【說文】海蟲，長寸而白，可食。互見?字註。　又【集韻】胡讒切，音函。義同。　又虛咸切，音醶。同?，蛤屬。

螊字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
螊字的起名意思

暂无。

Sting
Basic explanation of words
Sting
lián
A clam-like animal that grows in the sea. The meat can be eaten: "Or go to the seaside, stay at the seaside, and raise it."
Sting
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Jiyun" cut from salt, flat salt, come. ]
Animal names. Clam.
Sting
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　螊; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1092 Page 37
[Tang Yun] Cut the salt with strength [Ji Yun] Cut the salt from the salt, and the sound is clean. [Said the text] Sea worms, long inches and white, edible. See each other? Note.　[Jiyun] Hu slanderously cut, sound letter. The same meaning.　It's salty and salty again, sound 醶. Same?, clam.
